title: MeterReadingPayload
description: Signed meter reading payload for energy market oracle submissions. Used by oracle-adapter, RPC, CLI, and explorer tooling.

provider_id.description: Unique identifier for the energy provider (e.g., 'energy-0x00')

meter_address.description: Physical or logical meter identifier bound to the provider

kwh_reading.description: Cumulative kWh reading from the meter

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) when reading was taken

signature.description: Hex-encoded Ed25519 or Dilithium signature over signing_bytes()

$comment: Shared schema for crates/oracle-adapter, node/src/rpc/energy.rs, cli/src/energy.rs
